title: Teamwork
text: I have worked in Teams of various sizes across multiple Orgs. Most of the time in close contact, as if I would share an office with them.

title: Software Testing
text: Testing is critical for every non trivial software and therefore best implemented as early as possible.

title: Agile Methods
text: I am accustomed to work in an agile environment and had the opportunity to guide other teams in this regard.

title: New Technology
text: New Technology, like currently LLMs, should always be evaluated and integrated into the Product or Toolchain, if useful of cause.
